TierListPage.title: Tier List
TierListPage.description: Only the tier of Identities/EGO matters. Within tiers, the position of Identities/EGO is NOT a ranking of strength.

identities.SSS: The strongest identities, with a wide range of usage and performing well in most situations
identities.SS: Very strong identities, with uncomplicated conditions for realization, but with potential/universality less than that of the SSS tier identities
identities.S: Strong identities that require a lot of conditions for their realization
identities.A: Average in strength identities. Not bad, but not something outstanding
identities.B: The level of strength of these identities is below average, they are easily replaced and rarely used
identities.C: Weak identities unable to deal effectively with the game content

ego.SSS: The strongest and most versatile EGOs, used effectively in the vast majority of situations
ego.SS: Very strong EGOs with a limited range of uses
ego.S: Strong EGOs used in rare or specific situations or not powerful enough for SS range
ego.A: Medium strong EGOs that are rarely used and are often replaced by their counterparts
ego.B: Mediocre EGOs that are rarely used and do little work
ego.C: Weak EGOs unable to compete with their counterparts

Filters.empty: The list is empty, but you can fix it by clearing some of the filters

TbTags.empty: The list of statuses is empty, add Identity or EGO to any slot

TbListIds.empty: No available Identities. Try disabling some filters.

TbListEGO.empty: No available EGO. Try disabling some filters.

ListEgo.empty: No available EGO. Try disabling some filters.

ListIds.empty: No available Identities. Try disabling some filters.

AboutGamePage.title: About the Game

text.1: is an indie horror role-playing video game for Microsoft Windows and mobile devices using iOS or Android, developed and published by South Korean studio
text.2: It was released worldwide on February 26, 2023. The game is set in the same dystopian, hyper-capitalist world known only as 'The City', where all of Project Moon's other works take place, including Lobotomy Corporation, Library of Ruina, and a webcomic titled Leviathan, but takes place some time after the events of all those stories.
